title: Templates for taxlist and vegtable objects
text: automatic checklist using example data set released package taxlist (called Easplist). 'exclude = "family"' prevent family names formatted italics. option 'prefix = c(family = "# ")' add markdown command set families sections document. option 'output = "html_document"' set output HTML document instead default PDF. Check output .
code: library(taxlist) library(vegTemplates)  check_list(Easplist, output_file = "ea-checklist", exclude = "family",     prefix = c(family = "# "), output = "html_document")

title: Taxonomic Check-List — check_list
text: Template taxonomic check-list generated taxlist objects. important functions called source code print_name(), indented_list(), write_rmd(), render_rmd().

title: Taxonomic Check-List — check_list

title: Taxonomic Check-List — check_list
text: object taxlist object used main input. ... arguments. taxlist-method passed function print_name(). exclude character vector including name taxonomic ranks excluded formatting italics (excluded call print_name()). indent character value indicating single indentation, multiplied taxonomic rank going top bottom. Indentation can either cancellec indent = "" can specified determined taxonomic ranks naming elements input vector ranks. prefix character value character vector named taxonomic ranks, used prefix. suffix prefix placed end line. rmd_args list elements named parameters (arguments) function write_rmd(). render_args list elements named parameters (arguments) function render_rmd(). title character value title document. output character value indicating format ouput using rmarkdown. output_file Name rendered otuput file. passed write_rmd().

title: Taxonomic Check-List — check_list
code: if (FALSE) { library(taxlist)  ## Subset of family Piperaceae Piperaceae <- subset(Easplist, TaxonName == "Piperaceae",   slot = "taxonNames", keep_children = TRUE, keep_parents = TRUE )  ## Simple checklist check_list(Piperaceae, output_file = "piperaceae", exclude = "family")  ## Families as sections in document check_list(Piperaceae,   output_file = "piperaceae2", exclude = "family",   prefix = c(family = "# ") )  ## Families as sections and small captions for the whole taxonomic list check_list(Easplist,   output_file = "ea-splist", exclude = "family",   prefix = c(family = "# \\sc{"), suffix = c(family = "}") ) }
